professionalSummary: Engineering leader with experience building video streaming platforms, and blockchain technologies with extensive experience in mobile technologies, mobile development and delivering high-impact products. Expert in TypeScript, Golang and Python, with strong communication skills and a robust track record in problem-solving, performance management, and cross-functional collaboration.
